channel.title: How can i limit my server to 10 people?
channel.description:
Im sure i changed the line
[code] public static final int maxPlayers = 200;[/code]
in PlayerHandler.java
but when i compile and run, i cant connect to my server.
Anyone know how?

item.title: How can i limit my server to 10 people?
item.dc:creator: @LoveScaper LoveScaper
item.description:
@LoveScaper wrote:

[quote=“Mrquarter, post:2, topic:125755”]Make that 10. Then compile and run.

When you log on, for the IP, put localhost.[/quote]follow these insctructions…
